website_summaries.verdict: Having a phone with two screens may seem unusual, until you see how convenient it is to take photos and write texts at the same time.
cons: Having a pair of screens may not be for everyone

customer_reviews.title: The second screen/case came with the phone.
customer_reviews.text: I’ll update this after I have a chance to use the device, but contrary to what LG has been saying, the phone did come with the second screen. Giving it three stars for all of the stress and confusion.
customer_reviews.author: Rob M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Productivity on the Go
customer_reviews.text: I just plugged in my Verizon SIM card, and it worked right away. This phone is AMAZING!!! Split keyboard on one screen and landscape-oriented document in the other. Finally, an affordable, tablet-sized smartphone that I can carry folded in my pocket, and I don't have to worry about scratching or otherwise breaking the screen under normal use. Well done, LG! You win!
customer_reviews.author: A. Shearer

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than expected
customer_reviews.text: The 2nd screen comes with the product in the same case so thats good. The phone itself is nice with good features and its screen is pretty responsive. Hooked it up to the network i wanted easily. And the 2nd screen is nice, still fairly new with it so im still experimenting. I like that you can detach the two just in case you want to go smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Best phone i have owned
customer_reviews.text: Wow i was worried about paying 699$ for a phone because i didnt use my old one much but 6 hours in and i am SO GLAD i did. LG does not disappoint. The dual screen i think is great just not much support for it app wise. However this phone is worth it with or without the 2nd screen. Its light, slim and has a good battery life. I haven't had a single issue with the fingerprint scanner and the sd card has a drawer it doesnt go under the battery. Im so impressed that i am currently looking to replace some of the appliances in my house with LG.
customer_reviews.author: Envie

customer_reviews.title: I love the dual screen, charginng dongle sucks
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. You can't beat the price. Everything works as it should. The only thing is that the charging dongle will be easy to lose. I have just recently lost mine and will be purchasing it from LG. The dongle is strong so it is harder to pull out. But, if you lift it up or to the side the magnets are useless. It needs to be better. I rate this 1 star less because of the charging dongle. It can definitely be improve on.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Battery life and quad dac make this my favorite phone (update)
customer_reviews.text: I come from note8 and note 9, tried note 10plus but did not like it. This has been my favorite phone the lg g8x does it all. Beautiful screen, you get used to it being flat. My favorite phone, the dual screen is just icing in the cake. (update) I live on 2 and a half acres in a state forest, so wifi is important. When I go outside to feed my chickens or mow my yard I don't lose wifi. I don't constantly lose connection, like I did with all my other phones. I only use the duo screen about 10% of the times, still in love with this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Carrera

customer_reviews.title: Best phone ever
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone and immediately fell inlove with it. The dual screen accessory is amazing because you can multitask like a monster. The camera is amazing. I recently had the note 10 plus and like this phone so much better. So many different options to customize your phone. Love love love.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it you won't be sorry
customer_reviews.text: I came from a Samsung Note 8. This thing rocks for the price. The dual screen is awesome and allows you to multi task easy. The battery will pasty all day is your soon isn't on you tube for 6 hours . fast gets great signal great camera
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Phone freezes when placing and removing from second screen case!
customer_reviews.text: Great little phone. Small problem everytime i remove or place the phone in the dual screen the phone freezes and have to soft reset the phone. Phone works great if you keep it in the case or out. But because you are issued 1 magnet for the dual screen case if you forget it you have to take the phone out of the case and well it freezes. It is very frustrating. I am almost tempted to go back to my Samsung a bad battery just to not deal with the freezing.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Porter

customer_reviews.title: Dual screen locks up the phone
customer_reviews.text: Well LG, you did it again. It seems that you are unwilling to support your own products, or even test them before selling them. It is to the point that I can no longer use the dual screen without the whole thing locking up. I am trying to contact LG's customer support, but I am being ignored. This phone seems to be a waste of money, and I would not recommend it to anyone tight now.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Marx

customer_reviews.title: Missing/ none provided- LG Charging Adapter Gender for LG G8X in box and poor finger print  sensor
customer_reviews.text: Good day, I have no problem with the phone except for the finger print sensor which is terrible and won't read my print. I hope you all improve on it. Also I was not provided an adapter for the dual case so in order for me to charge my phone i have to constantly remove it from the case to do so.I checked everywhere for it in the box the day I received the phone but I found nothing, please I really would like to know if you can provide one for me please thank you,
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Finger reader and internet conection is not good
customer_reviews.text: The finger reader do not work it sucks Problems to download pictures and send it Bottoms are so dificult to use. LG L4 have exelente bottoms located. Google asisten bottom is on wrong place Do not work properly internet provider or wify it lost signals everywhere, my Lg l4 was exelent and much better than this phone. Battery is exelent love it. Double screen is good. Pictures no too bad quality. I Do not recommends this phone at all.
customer_reviews.author: Milton Montero

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This phone started off great. Love the dual screen feature however, after the first month "after my return window closed", the dual screen decides not to work. I tried everything and nothing works. Better off getting a Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: soda

customer_reviews.title: Defective phone - had to return
customer_reviews.text: The phone has defective and I had to return it. The phone would not take the SIM card in order to call in or out
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy J

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy. Dual screen burns itself.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy! After three months of use, the dual screen has burned itself. You can see from the pictures that the inside circuits has burned and melted the outer case. Fortunately I noticed the burning smell and colled it. It might have caused a fire!
customer_reviews.author: A loyal gamer

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing.
customer_reviews.text: Was kind of skeptic on getting this, but after it arrived and initially set it up, I love it. I may not have a use for the dual screens other than "it looks cool", but overall the performance of the phone and its functionality are flawless so far. I'm honestly surprised I've never heard anyone talking about this thing, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Doug A. Grigsby

customer_reviews.title: Business travelers best friend
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent device for multitasking. I frewuently and responding to emails and text on one screen while watching the news or listening to podcasts on the other. I travel quite a bit for work and have grown to appreciate this hone and would not like to travel without it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Items taking forever to return money.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible item always lags and freezes and I'm still waiting for my money returned after 4 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: KevinAlmaida

customer_reviews.title: the design of the case hinge is bad. it lasted few days
customer_reviews.text: the design of the case hinge is bad. it lasted few days. And amazon sucks at returns. it will be like 25 days before i get my refund
customer_reviews.author: Peter S.

customer_reviews.title: Great but slight flaws
customer_reviews.text: Overall B rating. Love the duel screen functionality and it is fast Sometimes has issues connecting to blue tooth, and the keyboard trips out sometimes (hides itself while you are typing) kinda annoying
customer_reviews.author: liam

customer_reviews.title: There are better phones out there to choose from
customer_reviews.text: Dual screen stopped working after a few months of use and will no longer turn on. So I have a useless dual screen now. Battery life is great but the fingerprint reader is horrible and doesn't work. I've tried to reset the fingerprint reader a fews times and also did a factory reset with no success.
customer_reviews.author: Bcshopper27

customer_reviews.title: Great phone multitasking friendly
customer_reviews.text: I've used this phone for several months now and I've had no issues with it whatsoever a very good phone for the price
customer_reviews.author: Plasma Dabs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quad-dac for Tidal on a dual screen phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my Fiio DAP as well as its phone functions. The dac section drives my Ultrasone and Beyerdynamic headphones just fine. The camera is good for me as well. I like the pictures taken from this phone. It has been great phone so far, having the Samsung Note 9 at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: WeiP

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool dual screen. Speakers are t the best but works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Bam Bam

customer_reviews.title: Not what was promised great concept poor execution
customer_reviews.text: Does not function as discribed no apps optimized and glitchy apps once you have 4 open and need to close and re open apps
customer_reviews.author: Jaxon3xd

customer_reviews.title: Not user-friendly
customer_reviews.text: voice texting did not recognize any of the words well. Hard to edit on the phone. The dual screen is very nice but not worth the other compromises.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey R Snow

customer_reviews.title: The phone is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love the phone . it is amazing its all they said and more. The only thing bad is they advertize it works on boost mobile and that is not true. I had to change from boost to sprint to activate my phone.
customer_reviews.author: juan cotto

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone idea
customer_reviews.text: Overall amazing item. Finger print reader can be a bit leggy in response at times, but the products is really amazing whenin full operation.
customer_reviews.author: Levor Lettsome

customer_reviews.title: Great singular phone
customer_reviews.text: I think the dual screen case is a neat gimmick, but I have had the phone about a month and really don't know what to use it for. I also enjoy the bigger battery more using only 1 screen.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Mckee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with LG! This phone is way ahead of its time. I will probably never do all of the things this phone is capable of doing over the next 2 or 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Rayfus Ray

customer_reviews.title: Best phone
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I ever had. Traded a S7 plus for it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg whaling
